title: Did a university professor call Mary Poppins racism?
subtitle: "Is this real or ironic?" It was a question posed in response to a wave of cultural controversy in February 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: ∙ Dr. Daniel Pollack-Belzner, Professor of English Literature at Linfield College, an opinion column published in January 2019, in which elements of the 1964 film "Mary Poppins" were described as racist.
